document_title: Acute kidney failure: Causes, signs, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Acute kidney failure is often difficult to predict or prevent. But you can reduce your risk of the disease by taking care of your kidneys according to your doctor's instructions as follows:
Be cautious in using medicine
Only use medicine when you have a medical condition as prescribed by your doctor. Read medicine labels carefully before using, including over-the-counter pain relievers.; Follow instructions for pain relievers such as Aspirin, Acetaminophen (Tylenol), Ibuprofen (Advil), and Naproxen sodium (Aleve). Taking too much of these drugs can increase the risk of kidney damage, especially in people with pre-existing kidney disease, diabetes or high blood pressure.; Do not arbitrarily use functional foods sold online.
Pay more attention to your health
Regularly contact your treating physician to manage kidney-related diseases and other chronic diseases.; Regular health check-ups or by doctor's appointment
Build a healthy lifestyle
Establish a balanced diet, diversify food groups, increase vegetables and fruits, avoid foods rich in sugar, salt and fat.; Limit alcohol, tobacco and stimulants; Increase exercise appropriate to your physical condition with healthy sports such as swimming, walking, jogging...

These include laparoscopic kidney stone surgery, kidney transplant, tumor resection to preserve kidney parenchyma; Radical nephrectomy; Radical prostatectomy; total bladder resection and small bowel cystoplasty; adrenalectomy; shaping urinary tract defects... Diagnosis - medical and surgical treatment of all male diseases.
To schedule an appointment for prostate examination and surgery with leading experts at the Center for Urology and Nephrology, Department of Andrology - Urology, Tam Anh General Hospital System, you can make an appointment online through the following methods: The following:
Call hotline 0287 102 6789 (HCMC) or 024 3872 3872 (Hanoi) to register for a private medical appointment with a specialist, through customer service staff.; Register for a medical appointment with any doctor you trust at the link: https://tamanhhospital.vn/danh-cho-khach-hang/dat-lich-kham/; Send a message on Tam Anh General Hospital Fanpage or Tam Anh General Hospital Urology and Andrology Fanpage; Text message via Zalo OA of Tam Anh General Hospital.
Acute kidney failure is one of the dangerous diseases, seriously threatening the patient's health. Therefore, each person needs to pay more attention to their health, especially when they have chronic diseases, to prevent acute kidney failure. If you detect signs of illness, you should immediately go to a specialized medical facility to receive timely support, increase your ability to recover and prevent complications.
